original_title: SC lifts travel ban on MR, BR over FR on mismanagement of economy
original_body_lines: The Supreme Court today announced that the travel ban imposed on former Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa and former Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa would not be effective any further in connection with the Fundamental Rights petitions filed over financial irregularities and mismanagement of the Sri Lanka economy.  (Lakmal Sooriyagoda )
